description: The root cause identified in this patch management post is associated with the vulnerability referenced by CVE-2023-38545. This vulnerability impacts specific Microsoft products, necessitating a timely update to mitigate potential threats. The delayed response to patching may be due to previously uncharted complexities in the underlying code or a lack of awareness in recent build numbers prior to the update. Thus, the issues surrounding CVE-2023-38545 highlight the critical need for up-to-date vulnerability assessments and rigorous patch management practices. Additional details and guidance can be found in the advisory linked in the context, which outlines the specifics of the update.
